title: realme 80 cm (32 inch) HD Ready LED Smart Android TV  (TV 32)

product_specification.In The Box: 1U contains LED TV 1N, Power Cable 1N, Remote Control 1N, Battery 2N, Manual 1N, Stand 1N
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MPG, MPEG, MPEG2 -PS, MP4, MKV, AVI, ASF, FLV, H.263, H.264, MPEG1/2/4
product_specification.Other Video Features: Chroma Boost Picture Engine - Realme's advanced image processing technology, Ultra Bright Display with Brighness Upto 400 nits
product_specification.Supported Audio Formats: MPEG1/2 Layer1, MPEG1/2 Layer2, MPEG1/2/2.5 Layer3, AAC, HEAAC, WMA ,WMA Pro, LPCM, IMA-ADPCM/MS-ADPCM, AC3, EAC3
product_specification.Other Audio Features: 24 W Quad Speaker Setup, with each speaker containing a Tweeter and a Full frequency speaker
product_specification.Other Internet Features: Certified Android TV, Chromecast Built-IN, Voice Search Enabled Remote, Android Pie 9.0
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: HDMI 1 - ARC + CEC Compatible, HDMI 2 and 3 - CEC Compatible
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Domestic Warranty, 2 Years on Panel
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Defects due to Manufacturing Fault or Defective Material or Workmanship Only
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Any Damage Caused due to Improper Self-Installation by Customer or Any Unauthorized Technician. Physical Damage, Dent, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Scratches due to Normal Wear and Tear. Damage Caused due to Natural Act of God, Fire, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Accident or Damage by Any External Force. Warranty Does not Cover Any External Accessories (such as Battery, cable etc.) Any Damage Caused due to Tampering of the Product, Disassembly by any Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: 1. Covered under Standard Installation - Table mounting using standard stand supplied as accessory with TV Extra charges are applicable for wall mounts as, Rs. 399 for 32" display size and Rs. 499 for >32" display size, except 55" display size which is free of cost - Connecting with available power source (within 1 meter) - Connecting / Setting up various available input source for Audio Video based on model - Connecting with available wifi (for smart TV) - Checking TV for proper functioning - Demonstration of the TV and its features

product_description.Overview: This realme TV’s Bezel-less design makes it a thing of beauty. Thanks to its 8.7 mm thin bezels, this TV makes your favourite video content highly immersive.

Review of Realme TV 32inch(80cm)
Display- 9/10 Almost Same as most of the TV'S like, Mi, Motorola, slightly better for the Croma boost

Sound- 8/10 Best in the segment, 24W speakers with dedicated twitter, but if you table mount it, in high sound it may sound stirring a little, so wall mounting will be best.

System- Stock pure Android nothing extraordinary Android 9, keeps the apps in the memory, Con here is you can't mute the system click ting ting sound, latest security patch, everything works fine.

Gaming- Works just fine so stuttering or lagging.

Chromecast- Works superbly well

Mobile Screen mirroring- Works good, no complaint

Remote- Best in the segment, dedicated Netflix, prime video, YouTube, Assistant button with mute button and input source button.

Over all review- Better than Mi Tv, Motorola and Vu for the price.

Right now if you want best speaker with good display and better remote control, you should go for it.

Overall rating- 8.5/10.

Also the jeevas(installation) guys are very helpful and well mannered, trained.

Lovely product for the price. The display (32" model) is bright and visible in a well-lit room and the sound is good as well. Chromecast works flawlessly right out of the box. Note that only the smaller one comes with RCA jacks, which is a boon for those stuck with set top boxes that lack HDMI. There was an update with the May Security Patch (nearly 1 GB) waiting to be installed. Together with the Extended Warranty by Jeeves, this is a strong first offering from Realme.

Worst experience ever from Flipkart. Received defective product. On first time installation by Jeeves brand authorised technicians the TV does not switched on. So, raised the issue and asked for refund. Then before returning the product another technician came to check the product. At that time the TV got switched on so my return/refund request was cancelled automatically by Flipkart. Then after raising so many time request for visit of brand authorised technicians for installation of TV finally the technician came to install the product but at that time again the TV doesn't switched on. It's almost a week my TV was just in a box in ideal condition and I am watching the box instead of TV programs. Now, hoping that my product get early replacement and I may get a good working TV.
Got replacement of the product. Having some issues with screen mirroring. While screen mirroring it shows message that the TV and the mobile device should have to be connected to same internet connection or say same Wi-Fi. But if we do not have any other internet source otherthen mobile then how can it is possible to connect both the device to same Wi-Fi ? Because in any mobile device we can't switch on hotspot and wi-fi simultaneously. So, I think realme should have to send a software update in which the TV should search the mobiles Wi-Fi and then it was possible to connect it with mobile device. So, Realme should have to do something in this regards. Also same issue was faced by me in my mi 4a pro tv in starting period. Then after I suggested same as explained above to them & they sent the software update. After that update the issue was resolved. So, team of realme should have to work in that direction.

Pros:
1. Sound quality is probably the best - Loud, crystal clear and doesn't gets distorted even at max. volume.
2. Bluetooth Connectivity Feature - Connect headphones and keep sound to yourself.
3. With exchange policy in place, I fetched this TV at a nominal price of INR 11,350. Now at that price, this TV is indeed value for money. But I wouldn't hesitate to think about any other TV at standard industry price for 32 inches Smart TV. (14-17K)

Cons:
1. Not the best picture quality - With premium full hd application subscriptions, I've checked personally and I do not recommend this TV for picture quality aspect.
2. Doesn't connects with 5G WiFi network - 4G network ends up lagging sometimes while streaming.
3. Slow OS - Have installed all apps that I've subscribed for - As a result, there's always some lag while trying to go back from an application to home screen directly. This worsens your viewing experience and is a major turnoff.
